text: The Russian Volleyball Super League 2007/2008 was the 17th official season of Russian Volleyball Super League. In all there are 12 teams. Dynamo won second title ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" !Previous season !Team !Town !Arena (capacity) !Website !Head Coach !Foreign Players (max. 2) |- |align="center"|1 |Dynamo-Tattransgaz Kazan
